title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Traffic
description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war on drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.

title: Erin Brockovich
description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

title: Cast Away
description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Almost Famous
description: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: American Psycho
description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: X-Men
description: In a world where mutants (humans with genetically mutated superpowers) are feared and hated by humans, two factions of mutants clash.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Snatch
description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: In the Mood for Love
description: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

title: Billy Elliot
description: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: Yi Yi
description: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

title: Unbreakable
description: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

title: Chocolat
description: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

title: Amores Perros
description: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, in the name of love.

title: Dancer in the Dark
description: An East European immigrant travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

title: Battle Royale
description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

title: Chicken Run
description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
description: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: Meet the Parents
description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: Miss Congeniality
description: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

title: Final Destination
description: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

title: Bring It On
description: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

title: High Fidelity
description: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

title: Best in Show
description: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

title: Wonder Boys
description: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

title: You Can Count on Me
description: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil when her struggling, aimless younger brother returns to town.

title: Pollock
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

title: Shadow of the Vampire
description: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

title: Mission: Impossible 2
description: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

title: The Perfect Storm
description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

title: The Patriot
description: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Remember the Titans
description: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

title: Pitch Black
description: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night.

title: Frequency
description: An accidental radio link connects a father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

title: Road Trip
description: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

title: Scary Movie
description: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

title: Shanghai Noon
description: A Chinese imperial guard collaborates with a train robber to rescue a Chinese princess who has been kidnapped and taken to the American Wild West.

title: Me, Myself & Irene
description: A nice-guy police officer with a split personality must escort a woman on the run from her ex-boyfriend and his associates.

title: The Cell
description: An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
description: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

title: What Women Want
description: A smooth-talking advertising executive, looking for a big promotion, discovers that he has the ability to hear what women are thinking.

title: Charlie's Angels
description: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: Space Cowboys
description: When an engineer is called upon to help repair an aging communications satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates must accompany him into space.

title: Before Night Falls
description: The life of Cuban poet and novelist, Reinaldo Arenas.

title: Quills
description: In a mental asylum, the Marquis de Sade battles a tyrannical doctor to uphold his freedom of expression.

title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
description: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.
